title: Indiana GOP To Revisit Controversial Religious Freedom Act
teaser: Republican leaders in the Indiana legislature are trying to stem the growing tide of outrage over the state's new religious freedom bill, amid concerns that it is a license to discriminate, particularly against gays and lesbians. GOP lawmakers are seeking a so-called "clarification" for the measure, but Democrats say that doesn't go far enough, calling for full repeal of the law.
